title: "Dressed in Saree, Robot ‘Zafira’ Scans Customers For Masks & Dispenses Sanitiser at Tamil Nadu Store"
excerpt: "Named 'Zafira', the robot equipped with artificial intelligence keeps tracks of the number of customers entering the store, at a time and monitors them to ensure they follow social distancing and wear masks."
